Player History

Traded from Baltimore to Los Angeles (A) on 2/16/2011 (Going to LAA: P N. Mutz, C M. Perez. Going to BAL: 3B G. Darrell, P P. Marquez)...
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to Minnesota on 2/8/2013 (Going to MIN: RF J. Winker, C M. Perez, 3B K. Vitek, C J. Romero. Going to LAA: 3B P. Sandoval)...
Traded from Minnesota to San Francisco on 2/4/2014 (Going to SF: LF D. Muñoz, C M. Perez. Going to MIN: 2B J. Giavotella)...
